body.en:
Go to User->Profile->Preferences

Turn on/off the setting Enable Interactive Pricing

title.en: How to enable/disable Configurator in page mode?

body.en:
Go to User->Profile->Preferences

Turn on/off the setting Configurator Pagination Mode

title.en: How to control notification mail preferences?

body.en:
Go to User->Profile->Preferences

There are four settings to control notification mail preferences. Turning of Recieve Email will switch off all notification emails.

title.en: How can user select default report templates

body.en:
Go to User->Profile->Preferences

Select default report templates in the report remplate section.

A dynamic attribute (DA) is any data point which is non standard to In Mind. Its is primarily created to be used in configuration of a product.

It also has two types: Dynamic Data Attribute and Dynamic Symbolic Attribute.

Pricing scheme is used in internal price engine to price a quote. It is a set of steps that determine how a quote can be priced or costed.

It comes with built in support to define the logic of getting data from a table, defining calculations etc.

For more information go to: Pricing->Pricing Scheme
body.de:
Pricing scheme is used in internal price engine to price a quote. It is a set of steps that determine how a quote can be priced or costed.

It comes with built in support to define the logic of getting data from a table, defining calculations etc.

For more information go to: Pricing->Pricing Scheme
